1.5.20  4:08 pm   it is the second day of my life with a midi keyboard, and I have realized that hitting large chords with one hand is very difficult, if not impossible. i have also realized that sustain pedals exist. so my question is: am I right in my conclusion that sustain pedals are essential for solo playing? that would be surprising. i always thought pedals are only for advanced players, since they're never talked about.
i can't tell if I'm having such a hard time only because i need more practice, or because I'm shooting myself in the foot by not having a pedal

     yea, get a pedal. it can help with things you didn't even think it would help with. just please LIFT IT UP WHEN YOU CHANGE CHORDS! so as not to be a slob

1.5.20  3:12 pm   what color is a color changing substance (ex. a mirror)

     a mirror is not a color changing substance, but a color changing substance would be different colors over time. a mirror however, is grey, but because it is extremely reflective, it reflects everything. the reason you can tell it's grey is because it does not alter any of the colors it reflects, therefore it would have to be an entirely neutral color

1.5.20  2:10 pm   My music teacher hasn't taught us about how to read music or anything because she thinks we did it in primary school, we weren't. So I'm feeling extremely confused about music because of that, and I don't really understand anything I find on the internet.

Do you have any sources that you'd recommend?

     i don't know any specific sources, but i can be a source. if you want to learn to read notation, i will probably want to start you off with rhythms. time goes forward from line to line. the first thing you want to do is understand beats. it's just like a steady ticking clock that ticks along with the beat all the way through a song. listen to some songs, and see if you can tap your foot along to the beat. also be aware that music notation flows left to right, and then down to the next line. left to right, next line, left to right, etc. just like the words on this page. let me know when you have found the beat for some of your favorite songs. if you look at the cowbell part for the second verse of my song 'hallelujah', that is an example of the beat. you might say i am hitting the cowbell 'on the beat'. it usually stays the same for the whole song. the songs you pick may have a faster or slower beat from that, but most of them will probably be slightly faster, because that song has a relatively slow tempo. see if you can find the beat for some of your favorite songs, then i will see if i can tell you what's necessary to start understanding what happens on the page

1.5.20  1:08 pm   your opinion on Pennsylvania? 

     it is simultaneously the biggest small state and the smallest big state. so in that way it is an extremely useful measuring tool, for figuring out if any state is big or small. just compare it to pennsylvania and bam there's your answer

1.5.20  1:05 pm   How do I find an audio editing software that does what I need it to do, with a reasonable price?

     you won't entirely know if it does what you need it to do until you actually use it for a while. then you will start to learn what it can do, and also learn what you need it to do. those 2 categories will also merge and change quite a bit, and also stay the same. if this is the first time searching for anything like this, you won't really have any idea what you are doing, but the sooner you make a decision and get started, the sooner and quicker you will start learning all these answers

1.5.20  1:02 pm   are you out of your mind?

     yes, and in

      i know i am.

1.5.20  12:59 pm   What are you up to today?

     goals

1.5.20  12:47 pm   alright bill, this year is going to be the best,

     why put limitations on it that way? for example, haven't i been working on extraordinary developments during 2019 that will lend itself to the work i do after? (yes) and what if there are setbacks during 2020, will there be a temptation to give up because the '2020' resolution seems failed? what if the entire duration of the year 2020 goes well, then will there be an understanding that things should go badly in 2021? i think it's best not to stare too hard at the jan 1s, and let time flow as it deserves

      for you and for me, creating for we are creators and is not creating the only thing that seems worthwhile?

     it's pretty good but there are a few other worthwhile things that i can think of ....

      we are remembered for what we created, some might say its silly, why put your heart and soul in creations when, in the end, we will all perish.

     why use other letters in your sentence besides h, when h is the last letter

      To that I say, how do they know.. I mean humans seem to have this drive to be remembered, its completely unreasonable when you think of it,

     i disagree

      but isnt everything reasonable?

     no

      For example we have the desire to reproduce in order to extend the impact of our species, maybe the end goal is escaping the collapsing universe?

     that is a great goal but first we're going to have to solve extinction. even before that it would be convenient to solve mortality in some way

      who knows, but thats not my point, my point is that if we have this strong urge to be remembered, maybe there is some deeper meaning to it, one we cant grasp?

     i think it's quite simple. the only way anything really seems to exist in consciousness is to be aware of it, and remember it. seems like that's a pretty obvious step 1 to reality entirely

      perhaps this life is just the first stage,

     i would guess it to be one of the middle stages

      or maybe its a stage after a previous one, and the previous one impacted this one, we were rewarded with different skills because of our previo us stage s, maybe this cycle never ends..

     that would make sense to me

      i dont know.. i like deeper questions how about you?

     deeper than what, exactly

      any imput on this one?

     yes absolutely

      good luck friend on earth
